makeup is already a thing most upperclass pones do so its not so weird for them.

now if we talk about other services humanity has to offer, like plastic surgery, it would probably clash a lot of equestrian culture, since it might seem anti-natural, far too much.

i would howeversay the upperclass pones would have no problem with it.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542378d6636872190e7c0100#post_542378d6636872190e7c0100

They'll get hooked just like the rest of America, and then Wallmart takes over everything, just like they planned. 


"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542379696368720c30a90100#post_542379696368720c30a90100

LOL yeah, I can imagine how all the nice girls would react to having so many people who like death metal, rap and so forth flooding their airwaves. 

Though I expect that they'll receive all of our other pop and rock a lot better than anything else. Classical would also have a lot of reception there as well. 

As for our culture, they'd be surprised about how we perceive one another, you know they aren't necessarily racist. Though the episode with Zecora does show that they don't know much about other cultures of their world. 

Having humanity flood through may cause an actual racial issue to arise, maybe. Or maybe we'd just integrate rapidly, I'd like to see how they react to learning about all our wonderful religions and what they can offer, or demand of the alien horse/human fusions. 

I don't think Christians would particularly receive Luna and Celestia with open arms.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6
